physicalActivities.title: Physical Activities
physicalActivities.subtitle: Importance of Physical Activities
content: Engaging in regular physical activity can boost your mood and reduce anxiety.
Aim for at least 30 minutes of exercise most days of the week.
Activities can include walking, running, swimming, dancing, or playing sports.
Consider joining a sports team or a fitness class to stay motivated and have fun.

mentalStrategies.title: Mental Strategies
mentalStrategies.subtitle: Mental Strategies for Emotional Health
content: Practice mindfulness and meditation to stay present and reduce stress.
Journaling your thoughts and feelings can help you process emotions.
Set realistic goals and celebrate your achievements, no matter how small.

techniques.title: Techniques to Try
items: Deep breathing exercises: Inhale deeply for 4 seconds, hold for 4 seconds, exhale for 4 seconds.
Positive affirmations: Write down and repeat phrases that encourage self-confidence.
Visualization: Picture a peaceful place or a successful moment in your life.

breathing.instructions: Follow the circle: breathe in, hold, breathe out, hold

journalPrompts: What challenged me and how did I handle it?
One small win I can celebrate.
What am I grateful for right now?

socialSupport.title: Social Support
socialSupport.subtitle: Role of Social Support
content: Surround yourself with friends and family who uplift you.
Share your feelings with trusted individuals to lighten emotional burdens.
Join clubs or groups that interest you to meet new people and build connections.

ways.title: Ways to Build Social Support
items: Schedule regular hangouts or calls with friends.
Volunteer for community service to meet others and contribute positively.
Seek professional help if needed, such as talking to a school counselor.

healthyLifestyle.title: Healthy Lifestyle Choices
healthyLifestyle.subtitle: Healthy Lifestyle Choices for Emotional Well-being
content: Eat a balanced diet rich in fruits, vegetables, whole grains, and proteins.
Ensure you get enough sleep (7-9 hours) to recharge your body and mind.
Limit screen time and avoid excessive social media use to reduce stress.

tips.title: Tips for Healthy Living
items: Plan meals ahead to ensure you eat nutritious foods.
Establish a bedtime routine to improve sleep quality.
Engage in hobbies and activities that bring you joy and relaxation.

closing.reminder: Remember: Developing an emotional health plan takes time and commitment. Prioritize your emotional well-being and make small, consistent changes for a healthier, happier you.
